name: Adventure Trip: London Collector's Edition
description:
Get ready to embark on an adventure trip to London. This journey will take you to 20 famous locations in the city. Not only would you visit the beautiful locations, but also find 100 interesting facts we bet you did not know about the objects you see every day.
As you move on in the game, the journey also unfolds 6 mini puzzle games which will add to the fun and give you a delightful little break from the fact-finding.
The game proceeds in 5 different modes including word, silhouette, scrambled words, missing vowels, and finding pairs. So get your gamer fingers on the screen and begin the hunt.

• 100 amazing facts to find
• Explore 20 locations of London
• Collect 15 unique items for your treasure
• 5 Modes – Word, Silhouette, Scrambled Word, Missing Vowels, Finding Pairs
• Collector Edition include, 5 hidden objects scene, 3 mini games and 14 wallpapers
